title: Solution of a separable differential equation

content.question: Which of the following is the solution to the differential equation <math> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <mi>d</mi> <mi>y</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>d</mi> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> </mfrac> <mo>=</mo> <msup> <mi>e</mi> <mrow> <mi>y</mi> <mo>+</mo> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> </math> with the initial condition <math> <mrow> <mi>y</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mn>0</mn> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mo>=</mo> <mo>−</mo> <mi>ln</mi> <mn>4</mn> </mrow> </math>?

topic.text: 7.7: Finding Particular Solutions Using Initial Conditions and Separation of Variables

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
